room_title: Escape room "Wizard and Dragon" by Xscapes in Binghamton
room_description: In the Subterranean caves beneath the remote glacier Drangajokull lays the lair of Nidreki the Awesome and feared fire dragon of the North. Spakonur, the wizard of Akueryri Iceland, has taken the Dragon's eggs to increase his power and train the young dragons. You must go to the Wizard's house, retrieve the eggs and return them to a very angry dragon before she burns down the entire town. You must not let the dragon see you.
